news_title: Palawan NGO is Beneficiary of Cardano-Based Proof of Impact Project | BitPinas
news_content: BitPinas Crypto News Philippines Palawan NGO Network Inc., an organization of non-government organizations (NGOs) and people‚Äôs organizations (POs) in Palawan that seeks to present a broader NGO consensus in the province, can now receive $ADA donations through the Proof of Impact Platform (PIP). What‚Äôs the significance:Crypto enthusiasts can now donate using crypto in the entity, showing the power of digital transactions to help others. Key Details:Interested enthusiasts can donate 50 $ADA, or around $17, on thislinkby NMKR Pay. What is PIP?Proof of Impact Platform is a project that pledged to use blockchain, NFT, and related technologies to enhance the proven impact of NGOs, and associations. The Developer:PIP was produced by Sustainable ADA, a space that offers information about the transformative potential and impact of Cardano network. ‚ÄúWe aim to pilot how Web3, and Cardano blockchain technologies can be leveraged for positive social and environmental impact by giving communities the opportunity to develop and acquire digital skills, and discover digital economic opportunities from within the Impact Web3 ecosystem.‚Äù 1/5üáµüá≠ On National Heroes DayüóìÔ∏è 26th August 2024ü§ú Bring Justice To Injustice ü§õüé∂ Streets of ADA music and art will be available for purchase üé∂üå¥ In support of real life heroes and environmental defenders at Palawan NGO Network Inc. (PNNI) üå¥Like+RT to save your spot ü§ùhttps://t.co/LodhChszkX What is Palawan NGO Network Inc. (PNNI)?It was formed in November 1991 to ‚Äúcarry more weight in the policy making process in various local government units in the province.‚Äù ‚ÄúPNNI believes that by uniting the NGOs and POs towards a common pursuit, it can strongly influence the direction of development for Palawan. Since then, PNNI has actively involved itself in numerous provincial concerns.‚Äù 1/The "Streets Of ADA" song,  by@juv_nil, is available to buy now!The song is part of the Proof of Impact ART collection, supporting heroes putting their lives on the line, to protect their land and rainforests from illegal deforestation in Palawan, the Philippines.pic.twitter.com/NiTTDedXTZ This article is published on BitPinas:Palawan NGO is a Beneficiary of Cardano-Based Proof of Impact Project What else is happening in Crypto Philippines and beyond?
